  • Method Details

    • createMessage

      @Nullable M createMessage(@NotNull V viewer, @NotNull @NotNull Component message)
      Creates a message.

      Messages should not be translated to a viewer's locale, this is done elsewhere.

      Parameters:
      viewer - a viewer
      message - a message
      Returns:
      a message or null
      Since:
      4.0.0
